name: Berks
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Jon Williams - CRL Group PLC. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story:

The Berks have arrived, they are everywhere, protected by their ever faithful homig Drones, which cannot be destroyed (only stunned temporarily). Your mission - clean each territory (29 screens) of the mindless Berks using your expanding Terror Tank. The number of Berks left to be destroyed is indicated in the bottom of the screen. How long can you survive?

Scoring: 50 Points per Berk, 10 Points per stunned Drone.
If you reach level 29, the game will ends.

Controls on original machine:

Start the game: START
Left/Right/Up/Down/Diagonal: Cursor keys
Fire: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: ENTER
Left/Right/Up/Down/Diagonal: Arrow keys
Fire: Z

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Berks
